channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 NFL Power Rankings Week 14: Who's Really the Best Team in Football?
item.description: Ralph Vacchiano sorts out the NFL's hierarchy after every week of the 2025 season.

item.title: Robert Griffin III Covers All Things 'Outta Pocket' in Sports, Culture, and More
item.description: Watch new episodes of "Outta Pocket With RGIII" every Monday.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Patriots' Win Over the Giants
item.description: The Patriots are the first NFL team with 11 wins. Here's what we learned from their win over the Giants.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the U.S. Women's Team's Two Wins Over Italy
item.description: After Friday's 3-0 victory over Italy, the USWNT beat the European side again on Monday to end 2025 on a high note. Here are my takeaways.

item.title: Yankees to Mets: Devin Williams Nears Deal to Switch New York Teams
item.description: Free agent reliever Devin Williams has reportedly agreed to a contract with the New York Mets.

item.title: Giants bench Carter again at start of MNF loss
item.description: Giants first-round pick Abdul Carter didn't start or play early in Monday night's matchup with the Patriots because of a coach's decision.

item.title: 'When do we get our Siakam?': What to make of the Bulls' uneven early season
item.description: From a 6-1 start to a 9-10 record to begin December, which Chicago Bulls team is the real version and what could be next?

item.title: Wetzel: Lane Kiffin left an actual playoff team for a theoretical one. He should be honest about why
item.description: Lane Kiffin might be a great coach, but he isn't being treated unfairly by Ole Miss or "the calendar" or anything else.

item.title: Who is NBA Cup MVP? Can anyone stop OKC? Big questions ahead of the quarters
item.description: Breaking down the biggest NBA Cup group stage surprises and what lies ahead in the knockout rounds.
